title: Video: MONEY – SOLONG (GODISDEAD)
content:
Photo credit: Julien Bourgeois

You don’t need me to tell you again just how special MONEY are.

With the previously released Goodnight London selling out within days of being made available, new single SOLONG (GODISDEAD) is destined for the same fate. There’s an ethereal, hauntingly beautiful aspect to MONEY’s music that is fascinatingly difficult to place, and even harder to replicate. Touches of Sigur Ros and James Blake creep in at times, yet ultimately, they’re completely unique and utterly devastating. SOLONG (GODISDEAD) is released on 14 May on Almost Musique.

Via (No Fear of Pop)
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
